metadata.name: PowerShell Download Pattern
metadata.comment: Detects a Powershell process that contains download commands in its command line string

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\powershell.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\pwsh.exe'))) AND (lower(LOWER(process.file.name)) in ('powershell\\.exe', 'pwsh\\.dll')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('new-object')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('net.webclient).')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('download')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('string(')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('file('))))

output.summary: Detects a Powershell process that contains download commands in its command line string
